column132: description:"ABC News is your trusted source on political news stories and videos. Get the latest coverage and analysis on everything from the Trump presidency
column152: description:"Your trusted source for breaking news
column195: 8 critically injured as police search for shooter"
column196: subheadline:"Students on campus were told to shelter in place."
column198: 8 critically injured as police search for shooter"
column200: 8 hurt in Brown shooting; shooter at large"
column202: 8 critically injured as police search for shooter"
column203:
body:{"markup":"

Two people were killed and eight are in critical but stable condition after a shooter opened fire at Brown University on Saturday afternoon
column205:
Rhode Island Mayor Brett Smiley.

The mayor said no suspect is in custody and law enforcement continues to search for a suspect.

A shelter-in-place remains in effect for the campus area
column206:
the mayor said.

Brown University sent an alert to students at about 4:20 p.m. about a shooting near the Barus & Holley Engineering building on the campus.

\"There's an active shooter near Barus & Holley Engineering. Lock doors
column207: silence phones and stay hidden until further notice
column208:
\" the notice said.

In a statement later
column209:
the university said they are working to determine who was in the building at the time of the shooting.

\"We had multiple exams scheduled in that building from 2 pm to 5 pm
column210:
\" the university said in the statement.

President Donald Trump said he was briefed about the shooting and the FBI is on the scene.

The situation remained fluid with the university later clarifying key details about the incident.

The school initially posted an update that said a suspect was in custody
column213:
the university said: \"Police do not have a suspect in custody and continue to search for suspect(s).\"

At about 5:30 p.m.
column214: the university said there was a report of a secondary shooting near Governor Street
column215:
but later said the report was unfounded.

This is a developing story. Please check back for updates.

"
